items.sentence: I\'ll have to think some more before deciding.
I\'ll never forget what you did for my family.
Tom is a part-owner of Chuck\'s Bar and Grill.
Did you know I used to teach French in Boston?
Tom married a girl who couldn\'t speak French.
I suspect that Tom is downstairs, watching TV.
I suspect that many of them know that already.
I think French is the most beautiful language.
The police were at the scene when Tom arrived.
I don\'t think Tom knows I\'m in the hospital.
